description: This file contains mock implementations of file I/O functions using external linkage for testing purposes. It primarily references an external mock object and overrides standard file functions like fgets, fopen, pclose, fclose, unlink, and access to redirect calls to the mock object.

methods.name: char * fgets(char * str,int n,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Mocks the fgets function, returning data from the mock object if available.

methods.name: FILE * popen(const char * command,const char * type)
methods.description: Mocks the popen function, calling the mock object's popen method.

methods.name: int pclose(FILE * stream)
methods.description: Mocks the pclose function, calling the mock object's pclose method.

methods.name: int fclose(FILE * stream)
methods.description: Mocks the fclose function, calling the mock object's fclose method.

methods.name: int unlink(const char * path)
methods.description: Mocks the unlink function, calling the mock object's unlink method.

methods.name: int access(const char * path,int amode)
methods.description: Mocks the access function, calling the mock object's access method.

ctags.name: fgets
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" char * fgets(char * str, int n, FILE * stream)$/

ctags.name: popen
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" FILE * popen(const char * command, const char * type)$/
